#!/bin/bash ### build and verify rpm packages ###
# install packages required to build the rpm yum sync -y -q || (echo 'yum sync failed' >&2; exit 1)
# start clean (set -e for d in BUILD SRPMS SPECS SOURCES RPMS; do rm -rf %{build-dir}/$d mkdir %{build-dir}/$d done) if [[ $? != 0 ]]; then echo 'setup failed' >&2; exit 1 ; fi
# install srpm rpm -Uvh --nodeps %{srpm} if [[ $? != 0 ]]; then echo 'srpm install failed: %{srpm}' >&2; exit 1 ; fi
# rebuild srpm rpmbuild -bs --target %{arch} --define='dist el%{version}' %{spec} if [[ $? != 0 ]]; then echo 'srpm build failed: %{spec}' >&2; exit 1; fi
# build rpm rpmbuild -ba --target %{arch} --define='dist .el%{version}' %{spec} if [[ $? != 0 ]]; then echo 'rpm build failed: %{spec}' >&2; exit 1; fi
# validate rpm for f in `find %{build-dir}/RPMS -type f -name "*.rpm"`; do rpmlint $f if [[ $? == 66 ]]; then echo 'rpmlint badness threshold exceeded: $f' >&2; exit 1; fi done
